title: How to Get Started with Technology: A Beginner's Guide
metaDescription: New to the world of tech? This beginner-friendly guide walks you through the essentials—from using smartphones and the internet to learning new apps safely and confidently. Start your tech journey today, one tap at a time!

author.name: Anirudh Kulkarni
author.bio: A passionate developer and tech enthusiast.

title: Top 5 Tech Skills Everyone Should Learn in 2025
metaDescription: Want to future-proof your skills? Discover the top 5 tech skills everyone should learn in 2025—from digital basics to AI awareness. Whether you're a student, professional, or curious beginner, these must-have skills will keep you ahead in a tech-driven world.

author.name: Anirudh Kulkarni
author.bio: A passionate developer and tech enthusiast.
